wikipedia_page.main: Peter Charles Richards (born 10 March 1978) is a former English rugby union player. A versatile player, he has played in three positions: scrum half (his preferred role), fly-half and centre. Richards retired in the summer of 2010 because of a back injury. As of May 2015, Richards became head coach at London Scottish.

response: Peter Richards (born 1978) is a former English rugby union player.
Peter Richards may also refer to:
*Peter Richards, staff artist at the Exploratorium, San Francisco
*Peter Richards, a supporting character from Dallas, played by Christopher Atkins
*Peter Richards (Royal Navy officer) (1787–1869), British Royal Navy admiral and Third Naval Lord
*Peter Richards (physician) (1936–2011), professor of medicine and president of Hughes Hall, Cambridge
* Peter Richards (1978–) -Rugby, England, Gloucester and London Irish.
